name: International Conference on Soft Computing for Security Applications ICSCS 2021
content: Nevertheless, this International Conference on Soft Computing for Security Applications \[ICSCS 2021\] will offers a wide area by covering all domains of soft computing. The journal invites the findings and research work related to the application of soft computing techniques for security, optimization, and decision support. The main aim of ICSCS 2021 is to promote Soft Computing \[SC\] techniques such as fuzzy logic, neural network, support vector machines, evolutionary computation, machine learning and probabilistic reasoning to solve various real-time challenges.
